mapper.select: select menu_id as menuId,parent_id as parentId,name,url,perms,type,icon,order_num as orderNum from sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} order by order_num asc
select menu_id as menuId,parent_id as parentId,name,url,perms,type,icon,order_num as orderNum from sys_menu where type != 2 and parent_id = #{parentId} order by order_num asc
select m.menu_id as menuId,m.parent_id as parentId,name,url,perms,type,icon,order_num as orderNum,(select p.name from sys_menu p where p.menu_id = m.parent_id) as parentName from sys_menu m

select m.menu_id as menuId,m.parent_id as parentId,name,url,perms,type,icon,order_num as orderNum,(select p.name from sys_menu p where p.menu_id = m.parent_id) as parentName from sys_menu m where m.type = '2'

select distinct m.menu_id as menuId,m.parent_id as parentId,name,url,perms,type,icon,order_num as orderNum,(select p.name from sys_menu p where p.menu_id = m.parent_id) as parentName from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.MENU_ID is not null order by m.order_num asc

select distinct m.menu_id as menuId,m.parent_id as parentId,name,url,perms,type,icon,order_num as orderNum,(select p.name from sys_menu p where p.menu_id = m.parent_id) as parentName from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_id is not null order by m.parent_id,m.order_num asc
